reviews.review_msg: (MACM409) I speak on behalf of 3 others along with myself in saying that I've never taken a more stressful and difficult class. If you have less than 1 year of computer science classes under your belt, you will probably get an F or C- Frequently assigns HW involving reading research papers and discussing unrelated ideas from that covered in class
Her notes are excellent & very well organized, and she really cares for her students, though she is unsympathetic to a lack of mathematical maturity.  Excellent prof for senior math students.
